### Total Score Calculation:
The total score is calculated as the average of all element scores: 
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{14}{5} = 2.666667 \]

This step-by-step analysis shows how each element contributes to the overall alignment score, reflecting the degree to which the image matches the given prompt.
